content: 2025 harry potter inspired advent socks each day starting december 1st a clue/prompt will be released in the slytherin sock syndicate thread and on the blog starting with 24 rounds on the first day of december we will be counting down the days to 1 round on christmas eve do not use the two at a time method instead please use two sets of needles you ll be working on the socks on alternate days for example day 1 on sock a day 2 on sock b the socks can be worked either toe up or cuff down depending on personal preference instructions are given for both you will need 8-10 grams of yarn for the largest stripe if you are doing a large colourwork section you will need 8-10 grams of each colour we will add a pdf with all the clues here in the new year
